decision_conditions: The proposed alterations, by reason of their failure to harmonise within the provision set in the Hanger Hill Area Appraisal and Management plan, would result in incongruous additions, resulting in the overdevelopment of this site, to the detriment of the character and appearance of the host dwelling and surrounding area and the visual amenities of neighbouring occupiers.  As such, the proposal is contrary to the National Planning Policy Framework (2021) Chapter 12, the London Plan (2021) policies D3 and D4, the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013) policies 7.4 and 7B and SPD 4 - Residential extensions.
description: Part single and part two storey rear extension; single storey side extension (following demolition of existing WW2 side air raid shelter);conversion of a garage into a habitable room including associated external alteration involving the insertion of a window in lieu of the garage door opening; loft conversion to habitable space; installation of four rooflights to rear and side roofslopes; replacement of windows with double glazed units to match existing; alteration to fenestration to front, side and rear elevation; and works to front garden, including reintroduction of the boundary wall (Retrospective)
application_type_full: Householder planning & demolition in a conservation area
